extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected Mozilla Products and Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the Mozilla products (Firefox, Firefox ESR, Thunderbird) are affected by retrieving the installed version.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Mozilla Products to Fixed Versions
extracted_playbook.description: Update Mozilla products to the fixed versions: Firefox 117.0.1, Firefox ESR 115.2.1, Firefox ESR 102.15.1, Thunderbird 102.15.1, Thunderbird 115.2.2.

extracted_playbook.title: Identify Other Software Using 'libwebp' Library
extracted_playbook.description: Check if any other software using the 'libwebp' library is affected by retrieving the installed version.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Fixes to Other Affected Software
extracted_playbook.description: Apply the fixes to any other software using the 'libwebp' library when they become available.
